parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Pointer to the peripheral configuration structure.

memberdef.argsstring: (NRF_TWIM_Type *p_reg, uint32_t mask, uint8_t irq_priority, bool enable)
memberdef.name: nrfy_twim_int_init

briefdescription.para: Function for initializing the specified TWIM interrupts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of interrupts to be initialized.
Interrupt priority.
True if interrupts associated with the event mask are to be enabled, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Function for uninitializing the TWIM interrupts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

briefdescription.para: Function for processing the specified TWIM events.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of events to be processed, created by NRFY_EVENT_TO_INT_BITMASK();
Pointer to the structure containing buffer associated with the last reception. Can be NULL.

simplesect.para: Mask of events that were generated and processed. To be checked against the result of NRFY_EVENT_TO_INT_BITMASK().

briefdescription.para: Function for setting the TWIM transaction buffer.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Pointer to the structure containing transaction buffer.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting the TWIM reception buffer.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Pointer to the structure containing reception buffer.
Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Pointer to the structure containing transaction buffer.
Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Pointer to the structure containing reception buffer.

briefdescription.para: Function for aborting the ongoing TWIM transaction.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Pointer to the structure containing reception buffer if the abort is to be blocking. NULL for non-blocking operation.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting TWIM pins configuration.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Pointer to the structure to be filled with TWIM pins configuration.

briefdescription.para: Function for disabling TWIM with all interrupts and shortcuts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

briefdescription.para: Function for enabling or disabling the TX list feature.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
True if TX list feature is to be enabled, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Function for enabling or disabling the RX list feature.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
True if RX list feature is to be enabled, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting the TWIM pins configuration.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Pointer to the TWIM pin configurartion structure.

simplesect.para: nrf_twim_task_trigger Function for activating the specified TWIM task.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Task to be activated.

simplesect.para: nrf_twim_task_address_get Function for getting the address of the specified TWIM task register.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
The specified task.

simplesect.para: Address of the specified task register.
nrf_twim_event_clear Function for clearing the specified TWIM event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Event to clear.

simplesect.para: nrf_twim_event_check Function for retrieving the state of the TWIM event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Event to be checked.
The event has been generated.
The event has not been generated.

simplesect.para: nrf_twim_event_address_get Function for getting the address of the specified TWIM event register.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
The specified event.

simplesect.para: Address of the specified event register.
nrf_twim_shorts_enable Function for enabling the specified shortcuts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Shortcuts to be enabled.

simplesect.para: nrf_twim_shorts_disable Function for disabling the specified shortcuts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Shortcuts to be disabled.

simplesect.para: nrf_twim_int_enable Function for enabling the specified interrupts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of interrupts to be enabled. Use nrf_twim_int_mask_t values for bit masking.

simplesect.para: nrf_twim_int_disable Function for disabling the specified interrupts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of interrupts to be disabled. Use nrf_twim_int_mask_t values for bit masking.

simplesect.para: nrf_twim_int_enable_check Function for checking if the specified interrupts are enabled.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of interrupts to be checked. Use nrf_twim_int_mask_t values for bit masking.

simplesect.para: Mask of enabled interrupts.
nrf_twim_subscribe_set Function for setting the subscribe configuration for a given TWIM task.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Task for which to set the configuration.
Channel through which to subscribe events.

simplesect.para: nrf_twim_subscribe_clear Function for clearing the subscribe configuration for a given TWIM task.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Task for which to clear the configuration.

simplesect.para: nrf_twim_publish_set Function for setting the publish configuration for a given TWIM event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Event for which to set the configuration.
Channel through which to publish the event.

simplesect.para: nrf_twim_publish_clear Function for clearing the publish configuration for a given TWIM event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Event for which to clear the configuration.

simplesect.para: nrf_twim_enable Function for enabling the TWIM peripheral.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: nrf_twim_disable Function for disabling the TWIM peripheral.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

nrf_twim_sda_pin_get Function for retrieving the SDA pin selection.

nrf_twim_frequency_set Function for setting the TWI master clock frequency.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
TWI frequency.

simplesect.para: nrf_twim_errorsrc_get_and_clear Function for checking the TWI error source.

detaileddescription.para: The error flags are cleared after reading.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: Mask with error source flags.
nrf_twim_address_set Function for setting the address to be used in TWI transfers.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Address to be used in transfers.

simplesect.para: nrf_twim_shorts_set Function for setting the specified shortcuts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Shortcuts to be set.

simplesect.para: nrf_twim_shorts_get Function for getting the shortcut setting.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: Current shortcut configuration.
nrf_twim_txd_amount_get Function for getting the amount of transmitted bytes.
In case of NACK error, includes the NACK'ed byte.
Number of bytes are updated after the END event and each MATCH event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: Amount of transmitted bytes.
nrf_twim_rxd_amount_get Function for getting the amount of received bytes in the last transaction.
In case of NACK error, includes the NACK'ed byte.
Number of bytes are updated after the END event and each MATCH event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: Amount of received bytes.
nrf_twim_tx_list_enable Function for enabling the TX list feature.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: nrf_twim_tx_list_disable Function for disabling the TX list feature.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: nrf_twim_rx_list_enable Function for enabling the RX list feature.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: nrf_twim_rx_list_disable Function for disabling the RX list feature.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: NRF_TWIM_HAS_ARRAY_LIST Symbol indicating whether EasyDMA array list feature is present.

briefdescription.para: Hardware access layer with cache and barrier support for managing the TWIM peripheral.
